text: James Madison University is a public university in Harrisonburg, Virginia. The university has about 18,971 students. It was founded in 1908. The current president of the university is Dr. Linwood H. Rose. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Dukes. They have 19 recognized varsity teams, six for men and 13 for women, with almost all competing in the Sun Belt Conference. ==Other websites== *James Madison University's Official website *James Madison Dukes' Official athletics website Category:Sun Belt Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Virginia Category:1908 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Virginia
title: James Madison University
